pyqgis_plugin.name: Modified Zoom-to-Point
pyqgis_plugin.description: Modified Zoom-to-Point Plugin (adds elements to the dialog for zoom levels)

pyqgis_plugin.name: Image Clipper
pyqgis_plugin.description: Image Clipper - Quantum GIS Python Plugin for Combining and Clipping Imagery to a User-Selected Rectangle

pyqgis_plugin.name: Image Cutter
pyqgis_plugin.description: Image Cutter - Quantum GIS Python Plugin To extract image tiles from a QGIS Image Layer

pyqgis_plugin.name: GPS Tracker Plugin for Windows
pyqgis_plugin.description: GPS Tracker Plugin for Windows - Quantum GIS Python Plugin for displaying the active GPS position and the track and saving them to SHAPE files in a Windows environment. To run in the standalone version of QGIS, download and install the Python for Windows extensions library from: "http://sourceforge.net/projects/pywin32/files/"
